îœ¼ :py:mod:`mymath.trigonometry.dist`
=======================================================

.. py:module:: mymath.trigonometry.dist

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains two functions hypot and distance



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   mymath.trigonometry.dist.hypotenuse
   mymath.trigonometry.dist.distance



.. py:function:: hypotenuse(a, b)

   Returns hypotenuse of a right angled triangle given the length of its side

   :param a: length of the first side
   :type a: float
   :param b: length of the second side
   :type b: float

   :returns: length of the hypotenuse
   :rtype: float


.. py:function:: distance(p, q)

   Determine the euclidean distance between two 2d points p and q

   :param p: x, y values of first point
   :type p: tuple
   :param q: x, y values of first point
   :type q: tuple

   :returns: distance between the two points
   :rtype: float
